sentences.sentence: Unfortunately, the engraver hasn't shown up yet.
sentences.translation: 因为我们的雕刻师还未上班。

sentences.sentence: Every engraver since Durer has had to live in his shadow.
sentences.translation: 丢勒之后的雕刻师不得不生活在他的阴影下。

sentences.sentence: Then the engraver found the ink had penetrated one centimeter into the wood.
sentences.translation: 有一次，王羲之在木板上刻字，后来刻字的人发现墨汁渗入木板有三尺深。
